title: Everyone Deserves Freedom from Spam - Junbeom Lee [PyCon.KR 2024]
description:
Let's talk about the development story behind the AI-based spam blocking app, <Smart Spam Filter>.

Solving real-world problems with "AI":

0. Identifying the problem (Too much spam!)
1. Building a service using LLMs
2. Challenges encountered when using LLMs
3. Solving the problem with a custom-trained model
4. What solo developers need to operate an 'AI' service
5. Essentials for building a sustainable AI service

Speaker Introduction:
Junbeom Lee / Beomi
Researcher in Korean Natural Language Processing. Developer of the "Smart Spam Filter" app. This year at PyCon, he shares his journey of building a service using both on-device LMs and LLMs.
